theorem convex.translate_preimage_right (hs : convex 𝕜 s) (z : E) : convex 𝕜 («expr ⁻¹' » (fun x => z + x) s) :=
  by

theorem convex.translate_preimage_left (hs : convex 𝕜 s) (z : E) : convex 𝕜 («expr ⁻¹' » (fun x => x + z) s) := by

  ⟨fun hxs => hxs.mem h, hs.star_convex⟩

theorem convex_segment (x y : E) : convex 𝕜 (segment x 𝕜 y) :=

  by

  exact (directedOn_iff_directed.1 hdir).convex_Union fun A => hc A.2

theorem convex_pi {ι : Type _} {E : ι → Type _} [∀ i, add_comm_monoid (E i)] [∀ i, SMul 𝕜 (E i)] {s : set ι}
    {t : ∀ i, set (E i)} (ht : ∀ ⦃i⦄, i ∈ s → convex 𝕜 (t i)) : convex 𝕜 (s.pi t) := fun x hx =>
  star_convex_pi fun i hi => ht hi <| hx _ hi
#align convex_pi convex_pi
convex_open_segment:
theorem convex_open_segment (a b : E) : convex 𝕜 (open_segment 𝕜 a b) :=
  by
  rw [convex_iff_open_segment_subset]
  rintro p ⟨ap, bp, hap, hbp, habp, rfl⟩ q ⟨aq, bq, haq, hbq, habq, rfl⟩ z ⟨a, b, ha, hb, hab, rfl⟩
  refine' ⟨a * ap + b * aq, a * bp + b * bq, by positivity, by positivity, _, _⟩
  · rw [add_add_add_comm, ← mul_add, ← mul_add, habp, habq, mul_one, mul_one, hab]
  · simp_rw [add_smul, mul_smul, smul_add, add_add_add_comm]
#align convex_open_segment convex_open_segment
convex_of_chain:
theorem set.ord_connected.convex_of_chain [OrderedSemiring 𝕜] [OrderedAddCommMonoid E] [Module 𝕜 E] [ordered_smul 𝕜 E]
    {s : set E} (hs : s.ord_connected) (h : IsChain (· ≤ ·) s) : convex 𝕜 s :=
  by
  refine' convex_iff_segment_subset.mpr fun x hx y hy => _
  obtain hxy | hyx := h.total hx hy
  · exact (segment_subset_Icc hxy).trans (hs.out hx hy)
  · rw [segment_symm]
    exact (segment_subset_Icc hyx).trans (hs.out hy hx)
#align set.ord_connected.convex_of_chain set.ord_connected.convex_of_chain
convex_lt:
theorem antitone.convex_lt (hf : antitone f) (r : β) : convex 𝕜 { x | f x < r } :=
  Set.sep_univ.subst ((hf.antitone_on univ).convex_lt convex_univ r)
#align antitone.convex_lt antitone.convex_lt
convex_le:
theorem antitone.convex_le (hf : antitone f) (r : β) : convex 𝕜 { x | f x ≤ r } :=

theorem convex_iff_segment_subset : convex 𝕜 s ↔ ∀ ⦃x⦄, x ∈ s → ∀ ⦃y⦄, y ∈ s → segment x 𝕜 y ⊆ s :=
  forall₂_congr fun x hx => star_convex_iff_segment_subset

convex_iff_pointwise_add_subset:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/-- Alternative definition of set convexity, in terms of pointwise set operations. -/
theorem convex_iff_pointwise_add_subset :
    convex 𝕜 s ↔ ∀ ⦃a b : 𝕜⦄, 0 ≤ a → 0 ≤ b → a + b = 1 → «expr • » a s + «expr • » b s ⊆ s :=
  iff.intro
    (by
      rintro hA a b ha hb hab w ⟨au, bv, ⟨u, hu, rfl⟩, ⟨v, hv, rfl⟩, rfl⟩
      exact hA hu hv ha hb hab)
    fun h x hx y hy a b ha hb hab => (h ha hb hab) (set.add_mem_add ⟨_, hx, rfl⟩ ⟨_, hy, rfl⟩)

convex_iff_pairwise_pos:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem convex_iff_pairwise_pos :
    convex 𝕜 s ↔ s.pairwise fun x y => ∀ ⦃a b : 𝕜⦄, 0 < a → 0 < b → a + b = 1 → «expr • » a x + «expr • » b y ∈ s :=

  refine' convex_iff_forall_pos.trans ⟨fun h x hx y hy _ => h hx hy, _⟩
  intro h x hx y hy a b ha hb hab
  obtain rfl | hxy := eq_or_ne x y
  · rwa [Convex.combo_self hab]
  · exact h hx hy hxy ha hb hab
#align convex_iff_pairwise_pos convex_iff_pairwise_pos
convex_iff_ord_connected:

  simp_rw [convex_iff_segment_subset, segment_eq_uIcc, ord_connected_iff_uIcc_subset]
#align convex_iff_ord_connected convex_iff_ord_connected

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/-- Alternative definition of set convexity, using division. -/
theorem convex_iff_div :
    convex 𝕜 s ↔

            y ∈ s →

convex_Union:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , » -/
theorem directed.convex_Union {ι : Sort _} {s : ι → set E} (hdir : Directed (· ⊆ ·) s)
    (hc : ∀ ⦃i : ι⦄, convex 𝕜 (s i)) :
    convex 𝕜 («expr⋃ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , »" (s i)) :=
  by
  rintro x hx y hy a b ha hb hab
  rw [mem_Union] at hx hy⊢
  obtain ⟨i, hx⟩ := hx
  obtain ⟨j, hy⟩ := hy
  obtain ⟨k, hik, hjk⟩ := hdir i j
  exact ⟨k, hc (hik hx) (hjk hy) ha hb hab⟩
#align directed.convex_Union directed.convex_Union

theorem convex_Ioo (r s : β) : convex 𝕜 (Ioo r s) :=

convex_Iio:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem convex_Iio (r : β) : convex 𝕜 (Iio r) :=
  by
  intro x hx y hy a b ha hb hab
  obtain rfl | ha' := ha.eq_or_lt
  · rw [zero_add] at hab

    _ = r := Convex.combo_self hab _

theorem convex_Iic (r : β) : convex 𝕜 (Iic r) := fun x hx y hy a b ha hb hab =>
  calc

      add_le_add (smul_le_smul_of_nonneg hx ha) (smul_le_smul_of_nonneg hy hb)
    _ = r := Convex.combo_self hab _

convex:
protected theorem convex (K : submodule 𝕜 E) : convex 𝕜 (↑K : set E) :=
  by
  repeat' intro
  refine' add_mem (smul_mem _ _ _) (smul_mem _ _ _) <;> assumption
#align convex convex

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr '' » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem convex.affinity (hs : convex 𝕜 s) (z : E) (c : 𝕜) : convex 𝕜 («expr '' » (fun x => z + «expr • » c x) s) := by
  simpa only [← image_smul, ← image_vadd, image_image] using (hs.smul c).vadd z
#align convex.affinity convex.affinity
affine_preimage:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ᵃ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
/-- The preimage of a convex set under an affine map is convex. -/
theorem convex.affine_preimage (f : «expr →ᵃ[ ] » E 𝕜 F) {s : set F} (hs : convex 𝕜 s) : convex 𝕜 («expr ⁻¹' » f s) :=
  fun x hx => (hs hx).affine_preimage _
#align convex.affine_preimage convex.affine_preimage
affine_image:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ᵃ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr '' » -/
/-- The image of a convex set under an affine map is convex. -/
theorem convex.affine_image (f : «expr →ᵃ[ ] » E 𝕜 F) (hs : convex 𝕜 s) : convex 𝕜 («expr '' » f s) :=
  by
  rintro _ ⟨x, hx, rfl⟩
  exact (hs hx).affine_image _
#align convex.affine_image convex.affine_image
add_smul_sub_mem:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem convex.add_smul_sub_mem (h : convex 𝕜 s) {x y : E} (hx : x ∈ s) (hy : y ∈ s) {t : 𝕜} (ht : t ∈ Icc (0 : 𝕜) 1) :
    x + «expr • » t (y - x) ∈ s := by
  apply h.segment_subset hx hy
  rw [segment_eq_image']
  exact mem_image_of_mem _ ht
#align convex.add_smul_sub_mem convex.add_smul_sub_mem
add_smul_mem:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem convex.add_smul_mem (hs : convex 𝕜 s) {x y : E} (hx : x ∈ s) (hy : x + y ∈ s) {t : 𝕜} (ht : t ∈ Icc (0 : 𝕜) 1) :
    x + «expr • » t y ∈ s :=
  by
  have h : x + «expr • » t y = «expr • » (1 - t) x + «expr • » t (x + y) := by
    rw [smul_add, ← add_assoc, ← add_smul, sub_add_cancel, one_smul]
  rw [h]
  exact hs hx hy (sub_nonneg_of_le ht.2) ht.1 (sub_add_cancel _ _)

add_smul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem convex.add_smul (h_conv : convex 𝕜 s) {p q : 𝕜} (hp : 0 ≤ p) (hq : 0 ≤ q) :
    «expr • » (p + q) s = «expr • » p s + «expr • » q s :=
  by
  obtain rfl | hs := s.eq_empty_or_nonempty
  · simp_rw [smul_set_empty, add_empty]
  obtain rfl | hp' := hp.eq_or_lt
  · rw [zero_add, zero_smul_set hs, zero_add]
  obtain rfl | hq' := hq.eq_or_lt
  · rw [add_zero, zero_smul_set hs, add_zero]
  ext
  constructor
  · rintro ⟨v, hv, rfl⟩
    exact ⟨«expr • » p v, «expr • » q v, smul_mem_smul_set hv, smul_mem_smul_set hv, (add_smul _ _ _).symm⟩
  · rintro ⟨v₁, v₂, ⟨v₁₁, h₁₂, rfl⟩, ⟨v₂₁, h₂₂, rfl⟩, rfl⟩
    have hpq := add_pos hp' hq'
    refine'
        mem_smul_set.2
          ⟨_, h_conv h₁₂ h₂₂ _ _ (by rw [← div_self hpq.ne', add_div] : p / (p + q) + q / (p + q) = 1), by
            simp only [← mul_smul, smul_add, mul_div_cancel' _ hpq.ne']⟩ <;>
      positivity
#align convex.add_smul convex.add_smul
add:
theorem convex.add {t : set E} (hs : convex 𝕜 s) (ht : convex 𝕜 t) : convex 𝕜 (s + t) :=
  by
  rw [← add_image_prod]
  exact (hs.prod ht).is_linear_image is_linear_map.is_linear_map_add
#align convex.add convex.add
